short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display IP and network information in a beautiful interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Simple IP Info

A lightweight Chrome extension that provides instant access to essential network information with a modern, minimalist design.

Description:
Super Simple IP Info displays critical network information in a beautifully designed interface. The extension features a clean, minimalist design with frosted glass effects and smooth animations, presenting network data in elegant, interactive cards.

Features:
• Public IP Address: View your current public IP address
• Local IPv4: Display your local network IPv4 address
• Gateway IP: Show your network's gateway address
• Local IPv6: Display your local IPv6 address if available
• Geolocation: View your current geographical location
• One-Click Copy: Simply click any card to copy its information to clipboard

Technical Details:
• Version: 1.2
• Permissions: Minimal permissions required for basic network access
• Compatible with Chrome browser

Usage:
Click the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to view your network information. Each information card is clickable - simply click to copy the value to your clipboard.

Developer:
Created by LOVECLM - Project TWO - Free to use

To access other apps from LOVECLM, please click the link below:
https://chromewebstore.google.com/search/loveclm
